thread.title: Blake Dalat
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Blake Dalat

author: Blake Dalat
title: Blake Dalat
text: Ea & every time I was in their office they were always helpfull &did their best for me for what i had to go through.I was always welcomed to their friendly office.I will recomend David Sklar&Associates to people going through what had to.Blake Dalat
